trans-unit.source: Represents the default settings for <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.ApplyDefaultSort" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.DataViewManager" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.Sort" />, and <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.Table" /> for DataViews created from the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa as configurações padrão para <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.ApplyDefaultSort" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.DataViewManager" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.Sort" /> e <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.Table" /> para DataViews criadas de <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" />.

trans-unit.source: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo é seguro para operações de leitura e multithread.

trans-unit.source: You must synchronize any write operations.
trans-unit.target: Você deve sincronizar todas as operações de gravação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the default sort.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a classificação padrão deve ser usada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the default sort is used; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a classificação padrão é usada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" /> that contains this <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" /> que contém esse <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filtro a ser aplicado no <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter" /> for a code sample using RowFilter.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <see cref="P:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter" /> para obter um exemplo de código usando RowFilter.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the filter to apply.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o filtro a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display Current, Deleted, Modified Current, ModifiedOriginal, New, Original, Unchanged, or no rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deseja exibir as linhas Atuais, Excluídas, Modificadas Atuais, Modificadas Originais, Novas, Originais, Inalteradas ou nenhuma linha no <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates which rows to display.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica quais linhas a serem exibidas.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.RowStateFilter%2A> is `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.RowStateFilter%2A> é `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the sort to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a classificação a ser aplicada no <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.

trans-unit.source: The sort to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: A classificação serem aplicadas a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> can have two defaults based on the value of <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> pode ter dois padrões com base no valor de <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> is null or empty (that is, the value is not explicitly specified), the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> is sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> é nulo ou vazio (ou seja, o valor não for explicitamente especificado), o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> no <xref:System.Data.DataView> é classificada na posição ou ordinal de <xref:System.Data.DataRow> no <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> default, an empty string, causes a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in <xref:System.Data.DataView> to be sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> padrão, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia faz com que um <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> na <xref:System.Data.DataView> ser classificados na posição ou ordinal de <xref:System.Data.DataRow> no <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> properties apply.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> ao qual as propriedades <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewSetting" /> se aplicam.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
